author: andyc
msg: Added entity manager to document parser so that there is a
non-null manager for components that query and use it. This
was specifically needed once I started working on the
document scanner which needs to scan XML content from
entities.

author: ericye
msg: flesh out the methods.

author: jeffreyr
msg: This version works only in jdk 1.2.x ....... It is not my choice but the maintainers of this module to
have that dependency.
Xerces will run fine under 1.1.x but it will not build in 1.1.x systems. That is life!

author: andyc
msg: Started implementing document scanner for milestone 1. I'm
going to start with a simple recursive-descent parser and
then move it into a state-machine later. The end result
should be simpler and cleaner than the old Xerces code.
Everything currently compiles but documents cannot be
parsed, yet. After other parts of the system start pulling
together, we should be able to parse simple elements and
attributes soon.

author: andyc
msg: Updated the milestones document and re-generated HTML.
